name: 米开朗基罗的凝视
writer: 米开朗基罗·安东尼奥尼
actor: 米开朗基罗·安东尼奥尼
summary: Quote: By the time Michelangelo Antonioni released Michelangelo Eye to EyeBeyond the Clouds in 1995, his keen sense of patient, intimate observation had seemed to give way to a kind of leering, gratuitous voyeurism in the film's repeated, over-lingering shots of the female form. It is, however, precisely this painstaking attention to the voluptuousness of form and tactileness o...
director: 米开朗基罗·安东尼奥尼
